text: pratyek praanee ko maut ka svaad chakhana hai aur tumhen, tumhaare karmon ka pralay ke din bharapoor pratiphal diya jaayega, to (us din) jo vyakti narak se bacha liya gaya tatha svarg mein pravesh pa gaya[1], to vah saphal ho gaya tatha saansaarik jeevan dhokhe kee poonjee ke siva kuchh nahin hai
